entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then becoming east 20 this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Sunday 23 April 2023
